Reviews.Content: hidden jewel terrific central location explore one charming areas paris hidden away quiet street newly renovated appealing interior design check room different see design comment rooms paris standards incl bathrooms air conditioning room yes american comment helpful concierge staff many excellent restaurants easy walking distance return next time neighborhood oh way price right

Reviews.Content: hotel pleasant surprise stayed several hotels europe one staff friendly helpful decor contemporary beautiful room perfect neat comfortable large european standards experience anything negative stay especially loved central location close metro lively area paris night time

Reviews.Title: “Really enjoyed it”

Reviews.Content: pros decor cons lack hot water broken elevator really poor breakfast close metro looked forward stay hotel months left disappointed

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel in a quiet neighborhood”
Reviews.Author: urbanita76
Reviews.Content: impressed aspects hotel room one main photo website double superior roomy large bath lovely interior decoration location perfect walking distance notre dame musee dorsay 15 min walk lovely st germain area spent time immediate area food shopping general atmosphere good service good english happily spoken helpful requests minor negative breakfast fine great however 14 euro expensive like lot hotels would recommend going le petit end street

Reviews.Title: “Much better”

Reviews.Content: completely renovated hotel 2009 situated 200 metres de luxembourg single travelling paris really surprised room large bed flatscreen tv fast free wifi huge clean bathroom large bath really recommend hotel good
